channel.title: Less is better comments on Matthew just read We Share Everything out loud today

item.title: "Matthew just read We Share Everything out loud today" by jlam
item.description: For posterity: Matthew just read to me We Share Everything out loud today – the whole book, end to end. I’m amazed: he’s 28 months old.
item.guid: Matthew just read We Share Everything out loud today
item.link: Matthew just read We Share Everything out loud today
